channel.title: [PI]Making an int the total value of all your items added up?
channel.description: how can i make an integer that is equal to the value of all the items the player has in pi?

item.title: [PI]Making an int the total value of all your items added up?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:5, topic:370628”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=466729.msg3413063#msg3413063 date=1290854886]

use a for loop

and what about getting the value for each item?

please explain to me what you mean by value? like the currency (in gold) or the item id? or?
[/quote]

I mean is there a method for getting the value in gold of an item?[/quote]

I highly doubt it, unless you just made a handler for doing all that. like:

private int value;

public void setValue(int value) {
        value = this.value;
}

public int getItemValue() {
        return value;
}

although I’m sure there’s already some sort of method for getting the item id’s themselves

then like use a for loop for the items 1-7000 or whatever to set the values for those items

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Making an int the total value of all your items added up?
